attributes.action: call on 643 Parliamentary Members to come to the aid of the country.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Following the impact of the banks, world recession and loss of trust in our democratic system and elected members. 
Now is the time for all good men to come to the aid of the country.
There will not be an early election and I for one would like the sniping and counter productive effort from the non governmental members to stop and work with the government in the interim, at least up until the next election.

During this period the electorate will get a more balanced view of which good and positive members should be returned to their seats and the forthcoming election in 2010 will be a straight vote on policy without spite and grudge votes  that have been fabricated by the media in the name of increased sales.

If non governmental members channeled their effort into what can be done, rather than what will usurp the government, then a greater momentum could be maintained in working our way out of recession.

Country first - party second

rejection.details: This is a matter for direct communication with Parliament.
reasons: Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
